publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-229 Mike Pringle: Don’t Give Fire A Home—That the Parliament notes that 20 individuals lost their lives in alcohol-related fires in 2006; acknowledges that the careless use of cigarettes, lighters, matches and the preparation of food while intoxicated are the main causes of these fatalities; further notes that the most likely group of people to start a fire while intoxicated is men aged 30 to 59, and supports the ongoing Don’t Give Fire a Home campaign which seeks to reduce fire deaths and injuries by raising public awareness of fire risks in the home.
